description: Atomically claim a pending device addition to prevent race conditions

main.description: Claims a pending device addition so only one member processes it. Claim expires after 60 seconds if not completed.

pendingAdditionId.description: ID of the pending addition to claim

claimed.description: True if claim was successful, false if already claimed by another

deviceCredentialDid.description: Full device credential DID to add (returned on successful claim)

keyPackage.description: Key package for the new device (returned on successful claim)

claimedBy.description: DID of the member who has the claim (returned when claimed=false)

errors.name: NotFound
errors.description: Pending addition not found or already completed

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of the conversation

errors.name: NoKeyPackage
errors.description: No available key package for the new device
